attributes.title: YOU MAKE ME SICKKKK🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: This app makes me absolutely sick to my core, this man you call your president is a rapist and a racist this is the person that calls the shots. This orangutan 🍊🦧 of a man makes me disappointed in America. This man told u to eat Lysol and said that less testing equal less infected people. Someone take this man back to school so that he can be educated. If my 5 yr old cousin can understand racism and can understand being respectful to each persons differences it should be capable for a full grown man to do the same. PERIODTTTTT👏🏾🗣

attributes.title: Dont download this app.
attributes.review: Worst app ever. Really laggy to the point i fell off my bed , bumped my head and my momma called the doctor and the doctor said ‘no more jumping on the bed’ . I can no longer have fun because this app ruined my life. When i hit the delete button it went on to tell me that i was forbidden to uninstall it. It then played music which caused my trex to fly which then she broke my roof and died:( . Not only did this app take away my privilege to jump on the bed, it killed my trex.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Worst app ever. ZERO STARS. This orange 🍊doesn’t even deserve to be president, this app doesn’t work. It took YEARSS to download and it’s a very annoying app. Why does he even have an app anyways. His wife and Barron doesn’t even want to live with him it seems. He’s using Kanye West for gosh’s sake. Anyways this app as a while is horrible. Too many notifications from this 🍊 🐻. I’m not even interested in all his events. #canceltrump2020app. He doesn’t deserve to be the president after this horrible thing.

attributes.title: Awful👎🏼
attributes.review: This is the absolute worst app to EVER exist!!!!!!! The download took months to finally finish and as soon as I opened the app my skin started to turn orange like a Cheeto! (With the exception of around my eyes of course) I reeked of hillbillies and stupidity, my clothes turned to the most ugly American flag tang tops and broken flip flop appeared on my feet!!!!!! Worst thing to ever possibly exist!!!!!!!!!!!!! 😡😡😡🤬👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼 I have taken numerous amounts of showers and the smell of cigars and racism still lurk around me!!! Did not pass the vibe check- WHATSOEVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *aggressively gags*

attributes.title: Unbelievable
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app cause you know trump 2020 but I opened it and I realized how traumatizing it could be for the teens who support him. Very nasty didn’t know his nasty pictures would be on there I feel traumatized and I will never unsee that this is no app for anyone who is a child of god I also wanna say one last thing before I go. TLM ✊✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿this man is trying to take away the only app that gives me and my family entertainment but I am warning you alt/elite TikTok has their ways.

attributes.title: Not what I expected
attributes.review: I am so sorry this is nothing personal but all of this horrible event that’s  going on it’s trying to show us that god is say that we are doing something wrong we are not putting our heads up people have different opinions about this president he might not be president to every one including me but instead of wishing the worst on him we could pray for him and our world because it’s feeling like it’s coming to the end with all this hate and trauma.

attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: When downloading the app I found that most of my information had been leaked! I put in my information and it was also leaked. I got telemarketers calling everyday. Most of my accounts were hacked and my credit card number was found supporting the trump campaign and being used to buy cigarettes all around the country. After opening the app I found large amounts of pictures of pedophiles and racists. You will be hearing from my lawyers.

attributes.title: Don’t ever get this
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded in my whole life this gives you false information about new and it is followed by racists and discriminating people like the black community it has the worst things ever and with all of that he shows pictures of little kids being ripped apart from their family because of ice and little kind being home less their is nothing good about this app I hate it so so so so much I am warning you DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.title: horrible service
attributes.review: Worst at ever. 100% do not recommend downloading I went to her call for technical support and no one helped and they all they said was to give us a call back in an hour and I called back in an hour and I never got a call back after I called. The search bar also doesn’t work I like to mention that and every time I go to use the search bar it goes blank horrible app and horrible features not helpful whatsoever.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!
attributes.review: This app is awful. When I opened it, it shared my location with the White House. Once they saw I wasn’t a crazy trump supporter they came to my house!!! My grandma was at the door and got knocked down and beaten up. They broke her ribs and pepper sprayed her. She is now partially blind and in the hospital. I had to run away leaving behind my family. I got taken in by some rabid dogs, but that’s about it. Please do not get this app, and if you do leave a bad review for my grandma and my poor traumatized family 😪
